meanings.definition: Blood vessels that carry oxygenated blood away from the heart to the rest of the body.
meanings.sent1: The arteries in our bodies are like highways that transport oxygen-rich blood.
meanings.sent2: Doctors check the health of your arteries to ensure proper blood flow.
meanings.sent3: I imagine tiny cars racing through the arteries, delivering oxygen to every cell.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the fuel that pumped through her arteries, driving her forward.
meanings.sent5: The arteries, like rivers of life, keep our bodies vibrant and alive.

meanings.definition: Main pathways that supply oxygen and nutrients to tissues and organs.
meanings.sent1: Healthy arteries ensure that vital nutrients reach all parts of the body.
meanings.sent2: Exercise helps keep your arteries clear and functioning well.
meanings.sent3: The arteries are like busy roads, delivering essential supplies to our organs.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness flowed through her like nutrients through arteries, nourishing all around her.
meanings.sent5: The arteries act as lifelines, sustaining our organs with the essentials they need.

meanings.definition: Channels through which blood flows in the circulatory system.
meanings.sent1: The arteries are like rivers that keep the blood circulating throughout the body.
meanings.sent2: Proper hydration is important for maintaining the health of your arteries.
meanings.sent3: I picture little boats sailing through the arteries, carrying blood to every corner.
meanings.sent4: His passion for life was the current that surged through his arteries, keeping him alive.
meanings.sent5: The arteries, like intricate pathways, guide the blood on its journey through the body.
